sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' export default class Edit extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state= { user:{} } } //Mounting for RESTAPI_Calls componentDidMount() { axios .get(`http://localhost:3001/react179/${this.props.match.params.idno}`) .then( (result)=>this.setState({ user:result.data }) ) } render() { //URL_Router_paramter_data var {idno}=this.props.match.params //state_object_property var {user}=this.state return (
{user.name} Details are:
{/*
ID {user.id}
NAME {user.name}
COURSE {user.course}
EMAIL {user.email}
CITY {user.city}
Goto Back
*/ }
) } }
